summary: The meeting held on July 12, 2025, focused on the progress of the ongoing project, addressing challenges faced by the team, and planning for the next phases. Participants discussed the current status of deliverables, identified bottlenecks, and strategized on resource allocation. The meeting concluded with a clear action plan and assigned responsibilities to ensure project milestones are met on time.
keyPoints: Review of project timeline and deliverables.
Identification of key challenges and bottlenecks.
Discussion on resource allocation and team roles.
Planning for upcoming phases and deadlines.

actionItems.description: Compile a report on current project status
Address bottlenecks in the development phase
Schedule a follow-up meeting to review progress

decisions.description: Extend the project deadline by two weeks
decisions.rationale: To accommodate unforeseen challenges and ensure quality.

decisions.description: Increase team size by hiring two additional developers
decisions.rationale: To alleviate workload and meet project demands.
